gmd:statement.gco:CharacterString: Fri May 3 15:55:33 2013: ncap2 -O -S /zeus/d2/usl/ncap2.nco temp.nc temp.nc Fri May 3 15:55:31 2013: ncks -d node,97,19700 -d node,19703,19719 -d node,19723,19731 -d nele,180,35028 -d nele,35032,35061 -d nele,35067,35083 /zeus/d2/usl/forecast/2013/output/netcdf/201312303.nc temp.nc Fri May 3 15:55:14 2013: ncap2 -O -s nprocs=nprocs;partition=partition;x=x;y=y;where(lon>0.0) lon=lon-360; usl_0001.nc usl_0001.nc model started at: 03/05/2013 10:14
